1.content: Let's start it off. Which Final Fantasy are we going to use?
1.title: To start with....

11.content: It's cold... and there's a wierd sound in your ears. You struggle to open your eyes, and, upon doing so, find yourself in a strange looking area. A steel floor, and the sound of an engine running. You're in the Highwind, though you don't know it yet! But where you are is about to become the least of your worries, as thundering footsteps are heard approaching your position. A shadow falls over you, and as you look high up, you let out a gasp. While difficult to make out, being so far away, you can barely make out the features of....
11.title: Final Fantasy 7

choices: You missed, and fell into her shoe
111.content:
A flower gentile floated down and landed without a sound. Giant brown shoes, clicked on the hard stone ground as she gathered roses.
"Aeris..." You mutter to yourself as you listen to her humming a long forgoten tune of yours. Her feet shuffled infront, threatening to move. Before you know what you were doing, your arms began pumping as you rushed out towards her, grabbing her foor as it sored skywards.
"Come on Aeris" A voice boomed,
"Yuffie? Tifa?" You cred out, sure that your balance wouldn't hold. You looked up at the pink fabric above you, a last hope? You launch into the air, the long strand on skirt taunted you in the wind as your hand stretched out, desperate and willing. Blood pumped, fear rose, time itself came to a crawl as it watched in fear. Another rose fell blistfully down on the ground, without a sound...
111.title: Aeris

choices: Aeris accidentally tries to brush you off
You fall inside of the dress!
1111.content:
Yes! Success! You barely manage to grab hold of the bottom of her dress. But her next step almost throws you right off again! This was going to be a chore indeed..... But at your size, the fabric of Aeris's dress offered many handholds, and you slowly began climbing up the dress. Anything to avoid being flattened under her massive foot. You didn't know where she was going, but right now it didn't seem to matter. You just kept putting one hand in front of the other, and slowly- very slowly, scaled up Aeris's dress. You wanted to get her attention. You knew Aeris was a kind girl, and would PROBABLY help you. Probably. She had a better chance of being nice than either Yuffie or Tifa.

As time went on, you got used to the swaying of the dress, as Aeris took her steps, and you slowly managed to climb higher and higher and higher. You were almost at her waist when disaster struck!
1111.title: Scaling Mt. Aeris

11111.content:
As she walked, Aeris looked down at her pink dress and her eyes fell up you. You saw her eyes starting to squint. "YES! AERIS! LOOK DOWN HERE!" You call up to her. Aeris hesitates and your hopes die as you hear the next words out of her mouth. "How'd a speck of dirt that large get on me?" She thought you were a speck of dirt! You were moving, using one free hand to wave at her. She then glared. "Ew! It's a bug!" She exclaimed. You start shaking your head. "No! No Aeris! Don't! I'm a person! Not a bug!" But it's too late to do anything. Aeris's hand sweeps in, and you feel her fingers push you hard. Aeris flicks you off her dress, and you fall quite a distance, slamming on the ground. You let out a scream of pain as you hit the ground. The pain's incredible, but somehow nothing is broken. But all the same, the pain prevents you from moving, effectively paralyzing you.


Aeris looks around to make sure that nobody is watching and then smirks down at you. "You know... I'd hate for the others to find out. They think I'm a really nice girl, and I am. But... when I see bugs like you... so helpless... I just can't resist this!" She starts to take off her shoes, and her beautiful bare foot hangs above you. Were you at normal size, this would have looked amazing and flawless. And from your position it still is. But it's far more than an object of beauty now. Now, Aeris's foot is nothing more than an instrument of your death. "Don't worry! I'll make this nice and slow..." She tells you. "So we can both enjoy every moment of it." Her foot slowly begins lowering towards you. The smell is faint at first, but as it nears, you can make it out more distinctly. The smell of sweat and foot. It's not a pleasant smell, and Aeris's feet were hot from walking in those boots all day. A droplet of sweat falls from them and hits you in the eyes. You scream and close your eyes, as the sweat stings them. Aeris does not notice. You've been completely covered by her foot, and aren't even as big as her pinkie toe. You were going to die under the foot of this goddess!
11111.title: What is that?

choices: You don't heal.  You're her permanent insole now.
111111.content:
Aeris's foot presses down on you, softly at first. It doesn't even hurt. You can feel how soft her sole is, and despite your panic, you actually begin to think this won't be so bad. Afterall, all she has to do is crunch down and it'll all be over, right? But unfortunately for you, Aeris isn't feeling so merciful. She said she'd make this nice and slow, and so she fully intended to do just that.

She slowly began applying more and more pressure, and began rubbing her foot across your body, pushing it farther and farther into her sole. The pain begins, slowly at first, but slowly becoming worse, and worse, and worse, until it's blinding pain. You can feel your bones start to crack under the weight of her foot. You try to scream at her to stop, but her foot is in your face and everything you say is muffled and even you can barely hear yourself! And Aeris's fun is only just starting.

Her foot rubs back slightly, so that you're under the ball of her foot. You see her heel start to leave the ground and the pressure begins to grow rapidly. "Aeris.... please...." Tears are in your eyes as you try begging the goddess for help. But no help is to be given. Aeris's foot continues to press down harder and harder, until your body finally begins to give way, and becomes little more than a splatter on Aeris's sole. She grins widely, lifting up her foot to admire her handiwork. Your remains are pasted to her sole and she sighs happily. "Wow, you were a squishy one." She teases. "That was fun!" She assumes you dead. Unfortunately, or perhaps, fortunately, for you, that is not yet the case.

It appeared shrinking made it impossible for you to die! But it clearly didn't make it impossible for you to get hurt. Even though your remains are splattered across Aeris's sole, you are still aware... and in incredible pain. Everything is in blinding pain. But the pain is slowly, ever so slowly, starting to go, as you notice your body is trying to pull itself back together from nothing. But your relief turns to panic as you feel Aeris's foot start to move again towards her boot! Oh no! If she puts her foot back in there and starts walking again, there might not even be enough space left FOR you to reform! You could be stuck being a splatter on her sole forever! A horror begins to sink in as Aeris's foot enters her boot....
111111.title: Aeris crushes you

111112.content:
You could feel foot on you, making your death slow, but painful.You started even to cry.
"Aeris!" you could hear someone calling her.
"Yes?" she asked. She isn't crushing you, but she isn't letting you away.
Your safer is......
111112.title: Someone stops Aeris

choices: She's off to get something to eat (Vore)
112.content:
Tifa!? The buxom goddess of Cloud Strife's merry little band? You can identify her mainly due to the fact you can't see her face, due to her breasts cutting off all sight. The fighting gloves were another hint, but really, the boobs were the only real hint you needed. And it just so happened that you were about to experience those breasts of Tifa a little more than you may be ready to. Because while you stared at the approaching goddess, mystified, Tifa tripped. Not the most graceful of actions, but it sums it up pretty well. She tripped.

And, unable to catch herself in time, she landed hard, sprawling out on the ground. "Owwww..." She muttered. "I can't believe I just tripped! God!" She exclaimed. She got up and checked herself over. "I bruised my knee too? Ugh!" She exclaimed in frustration. Well, a bruised knee may not have been something to celebrate, but you were definately in a worse situation. Mainly because when Tifa fell over, those lovely melons you'd been admiring landed square on you. As Tifa got back up, you found yourself wedged into the V of the woman's cleavage, unknown to her.... yet.

Tifa began to head to an unknown destination....
112.title: A soft landing

choices: Nothing, you missed the food in there.
1121.content: Tifa goes off into a corner of the massive airship where she's less likely to be disturbed, you still trapped in her ample cleavage. With every step she takes you bob up and down uncontrollably, and finally fly out. As you do, Tifa pulls out a brown lunch bag, and opens it, looking around to see if anyone wanted to eat with her. The fact she looked away, also hid the fact that you fell headfirst into her lunch bag, landing on....
1121.title: Lunch!

11211.content: As you fell face first to your doom, Tifa moved the bad making asandwhich be you landing. You just land uncomfortably when she picks up the sandwhich. You fall off from exaustion, and land in her open drink. You surface, and as you gasp for precious air, an orange liquid to sloshed over you as you approach closer to tifa's mouth. You...
11211.title: A sandwich

choices: i have walked so long and....
1122.content:
Tifa went to bedroom to sleep and hope, that knee will be better after sleep. Removing her shirt, she cathes eyes on you.
"Who are you & why you're in there?" Tifa said pissed off.
"I don't know, how do i get in here. And i were stucked in here cause your breasts falled straight upon me." you said. Tifa were saying...
1122.title: To her bedroom(1)! (Breasts and footplay)

choices: She plays with you by using her tongue
11223.content:
"What the...?" is all you can say for that (stupid) question, before Tifa scooped you up to her face level, opening her mouth....
"AAAHHH! Don't eat me! I'm too young to die!" you screamed before she throwed you inside to her mouth.
You landed on her tongue and you could see, where all human's saliva were coming.
11223.title: do you taste good? LOL? More like LOL WUT?!

choices: Right in front of her feet.
Onto her bed.... where she's about to sit!
113.content: Yuffie! You can barely make out her face from down here. Thank god her chest wasn't nearly as large as Tifa's or her face would have been invisible. The materia thief, however, doesn't notice you and keeps walking. If you don't do something quickly, she'll step on you for sure! You do the first thing that comes to mind and jump right onto her boot. Above you, you can hear Yuffie give a light yawn. "I'm kind of tired.... maybe I'll take a quick rest?" She heads into one a little room on the highwind that she made into a little makeshift bedroom, and kicks off her boots.... with you on them. You go flying, and hit a wall, before bouncing off. You land....
113.title: Yuffie

choices: "Yuffie! Get your &*%^ing ass back to the bridge!" Yuffie puts on the boots
"%&^*! We got turbulence!" The boot gets knocked on its side with the turbulence
1131.content:
Fate is a bitch, really. If it weren't for bad luck, you'd have no luck at all.

As the titanic ninja launched herself onto the bed, you managed to brace yourself by grabbing one of the rope-like laces of her boot. Before you could mentally pat yourself on the back for this feat of endurance though, Yuffie snags the heel of her boot with the toe of her other foot and sends the footwear flying. Your body goes spinning through the air with the renegade boot and with each revolution your grip on the lace weakens.

Soon your fingers slip, you utter a tiny yelp of fear, frightened that you would end up a smear on one of the harsh metallic walls of the airship. You close your eyes and wait for the painful end...

...which doesn't come, you landed on something soft, and warm. As you took a deep breath to mentally bring yourself back to this world, you noticed there was also an unpleasant scent hanging in the air. Like an invisible cloud, warm moisture surrounded you. You looked around and then up, to the only source of light in this new prison. Your stomach sinks as you realise just where you are, Yuffie's boot.

You try to stand up on the insole of this well worn boot, your feet slip on the somewhat damp floor though and you fall back on your rear. You wince as you push your hands into the slick spongy surface in an attempt to right yourself. Finally getting to your feet you feel the walls of the boot, trying to find a handhold to climb out of this foul smelling cell.

Suddenly the airship begins to rumble and then you're flung down the boot towards the dark, dank toe-section. Your entire body lays in the indentation of the young materia thief's big toe. Your small stature finally sinks in and your mind is filled with horrifying possibilities. "Would she feel me in here?" being one of them "Would I survive?" being another more pressing one.

As you sit in the stinking ditch that her toes have left, you hear a crackling noise and then a gruff male's voice over the ships intercom.
1131.title: IIN Yuffie's boot.

choices: "Yuffie, a man has shrunk. Don't take your boots off incase he fall's in!"
11311.content:
Yuffie looked up, her face in utter relief as she slowly roled her long black stocking down her leg. Her smile faded as she listened to the intercom.
"F%$# sake..." Yuffie muttered, swinging her legs from the bed. Her short black hair bounced playfully over her eye's as she strode over to her boots. She ajusted her black jacket slightly as she slipped her socked foot back down her ridiculously long boot, not knowing or caring about the person inside them.

You smelt the air as the temperature rose, rotting fish came to mind. A salty taste floated onto your lips as you watched Yuffie's toe appear at the heel end. You wanted to run right there and then, but your legs refused. Her foot slid over gracefully like a black angel, slowly covering your only light source. You let out a scream as her big te fell into place, imprinting your body into her soggy insole. For a few seconds there was a horrible silence. You awated your fate. The pressure slowly built up as Yuffie took her first step, her weight slowy fell upon the ball of her foot and her toes as her heel launched into the air.

Yuffie strolled out, unaware of the torment she was giving to the poor man in her boot as she headed out to the bridge. The sweat in her boots made slight squishy noises everystep.

"You wanted to see me?" Yuffie asked. Her black shorts hugged her leg tightly in fear of the instruction as the young ninja listened playfully to her instructions.
11311.title: Oh crap...

113111.content:
"ya a guy just got transproted in here shrunk so don't take off your boots he could acsidentaly get in them" he said

yuffie giggled at the idea but said "okay but i don't think he could just fall in these things." she said gesturing to her boots and then left scrunching her toes over the pebble that was in her boot.
113111.title: "Yuffie, a man has shrunk. Don't take y...

choices: Yuffie sleeps with her boots on
Yuffie takes off the boots, but you're stuck to her foot!
113112.content:
"Yeah.... I forgot...." Cid admitted. Yuffie stomped the foot you were in, in frustration. "Cid!" Her stomp did wonders for you, as she applied immense pressure on you. You began to cough in pain, and felt a few ribs crack.... maybe even break. You were in too much pain to be sure. You vainly tried to push her toe off, but Yuffie subconsciously answered by pushing down harder.

"I'll tell ya when I remember okay? Just don't go to sleep or anything, okay?" He told her, and went back to focusing on his piloting. Yuffie sighed irritably, and started heading off. Maybe she was going back to her room? You hoped so. Then you could get her foot off of you! It was hurting, and you were covered in her sweat. Yuffie didn't seem to even realize you were there.

The ninja returned to her room, and yawned. "Maybe I'll catch a quick nap first." She thought out loud. You heard this and grinned. You could get out of this hellish and smelly prison now! However, luck was not on your side today....
113112.title: Hell is a ninja's boot.

1131121.content:
It seemed as though Yuffie was even more tired than you thought. Probably really exhausted from all the make-shift work Cid's had her doing through the entire nauseating flight. You overheard Yuffie let out one last sigh as she stomped over to the bed, constantly shaking you around inside your little insole prison!

*THUD! THUD! THUD! THUD! ......THHHHHUUUUUUDDD!!!!*
"AAAAAGGGHH!!" The stomping ended when Yuffie literally jumped onto her bed... The impact snapped you against an inner shoe-wall, no doubt giving you whiplash to add to your broken ribs! Ugh... hard to believe it took you THIS long to realize youre tagging the wrong girl!

To make matters worse, Yuffie's apparently too tired to kick her shoes off! The moment she makes contact with her big comfy bed, she rests her head against her pillow and quickly drifts off to sleep. "Mmm... g'night," you hear her mumble. A good night youre obviously not having. Youre still crammed in the ninja-girl's boot and youre aching all over.
But on the plus side, at least she's stopped moving around and the way out is finally within your reach. Seeing as though this might be your shot at freedom for a while, you have to take it.

You slowly crawl through the tight space between her foot and her boot and made your way up to the boot's tongue, despite it squeezing against you really badly as you continued upwards, as if the boot itself didnt want you to escape!
"Ngggh.....NNGGGHHH!!!" you struggle to break through the little gap leading to the outside, "Rggg....Nggghh....GrrrAAAH!" SUCCESS! After what seemed like forever, youre finally out of the boot!
Sure it was just out of a girl's shoe, but to you it felt like you broke out of a maximum security prison without even alerting the guards! You'd jump for joy, but your body was still in pain after the little 'fun-run'. You merely let a sigh of relief and stepped down the bed, gripping your side in pain.

Aint got the foggiest what to do now. Maybe try to wake Yuffie up and let her know that there's a tiny person in need of help. But then again, what if she wants compensation for her services? Eh, well. You'll worry about paying her later! Right now you'll just have to-

"ZZZZzzzz....ooohhh....."
While you were busy thinking to yourself, Yuffie rolled over in her sleep... toward YOUR direction!
Your eyes widened as you saw her colossal body starting to down at you! You wanted to run, but you were in no condition to. Out of other options, you closed your eyes and hoped it wasnt gonna hurt so bad...

*THUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUDDDD!!!*
Thankfully it didnt. As luck would have it, you werent crushed at all. You found yourself trapped in a bit of space conveniently big enough for you to fit in. Unfortunately it wasnt long before you realized it was Yuffie's belly-button!

"Ah... crap!" you groaned to yourself. Beautiful... out of one cozy prison and cramped in another! And unlike the last one, there is no space whatsoever to escape!
Youre down to the last option: Wake Yuffie up!

"YUFFIE!!!" you scream as you constantly beat on the rubbery belly-buttony walls, "Yuffie wake up! WAKE UP!! WAAAKKEE UP!!!"
You scream and fight, but to any avail? Is your struggle enough to wake the sleeping giantess on top of you?
1131121.title: NO ONE escapes a ninja!

choices: She tends to your wounds and asks you what happened.
She is pissed off at having been woken up.
11311211.content:
"Mrrrhh!" Yuffie moaned and sniffed as she felt a slight ache in her belly. Eventually she could ignore it no longer and forced her eyes open. aStill lying on her back, she check the time and groaned when she realized that she'd only been asleep for a couple of hours. She grabbed her pillow and stuck it over her head, trying to ignore the heavy hum of the airship.

Suddenly she felt something wriggling under her belly, in her belly button. She squeaked at the thought of something being alive under there and leaped up off the bed clawing at her stomach to get whatever it was off her body as soon as possible.

Your joy at having been released from your fleshy prison was cut short as you were batted on to the bed by Yuffie's frantic scrabbling. Everything about you hurt and there was no opportunity for you to hide before Yuffie looked down and saw you lying there. Her fright at thinking you were a bug changed to shock and curiosity that you were a miniature man.

"Oh! How the heck did you get there?" she asked.

You weren't sure if she was angry at you or concerned for your well being, so you fell to your knees and clutched your ribs to highlight how injured you were, and kept your fingers crossed that she didn't try to squash you.
11311211.title: She woke up!

choices: "Just one sec!" Yuffie goes to her materia chest . . . uh oh.
"So how do we get you back to normal size?"
113112111.content:
"Oh you're injured! I'm so sorry! Did I hurt you?" Yuffie gasped. She ran over to a large chest and opened it sorting through the materia kept inside. Eventually she found one labeled "Cure" and brought it over to you. She bounced back onto the bed and picked you up as she cast Cure 3 on you.

Almost immediately you felt much better and stretched your arms out happy to move them without feeling a lot of pain. You turned your attention to Yuffie who was now only a few inches away from you. She frowned and brought you a little closer to her. Your embarrassment rose as Yuffie sniffed you briefly and wrinkled her nose.

"Sorry. You smell familiar but a bit gross," she said and paused. "Well, very gross," she said correcting herself. She put you back on the bed and sat down in front of you. She crossed her legs and you were left staring at Yuffie's boots. You shuffled uncomfortably as you knew why you were so stinky and the fact that you could smell her boots from where you were was an unpleasant reminder of the last few hours.

"So tell me how you got here and how you got so small?" she asked.

"I'm not sure! When I woke up I found myself here this size," you said. You told her how she had almost stepped on you and how you'd survived by clinging onto her boot as the ran around the Highwind. When you told her that she had kicked her boot off with you still attached she gasped in horror.

"F$%^! I could have killed you," she cried. You were pleasantly surprised how she seemed to care about your safety.

"It was ok," you reassured her, "I landed on something . . . soft."

"The bed? she asked naively. You shook your head as you got increasingly uncomfortable. "Then what?" she looked at you suspiciously. You plucked up the courage to reply although you knew that she wouldn't like the answer.

"Your boot. I landed in your boot."

Suddenly Yuffie went bright red and she stared down at her boots. Immediately you could see that she knew why you smelled so familiar and she couldn't look at you in the shame.

"So when I put my boots on I . . . I squashed you with my feet?" She said, shocked. You nodded to her, trying to be as kind as you can. "And the reason why you smell is because . . . ?" she said horrified. You nod again and to your surprise she started to cry. "I'm so sorry," she said. "I know my feet stink . . . that's why I wear these boots. Vincent took one sniff of my feet and now won't talk to me. I can't get anyone to stay around me for that long and the only reason why the others haven't noticed is because I move so quickly around them," she said burying her head in her hands.

You felt sad for her. If you were full sized you could have comforted her but as it was you could ony gently pat the toe of her boot.

"It was okay!" you told her trying to make her feel better. "your boots were very comfortable. They were so warm and snug. And your foot pressed against me was nice as well. It was like getting massaged all over."

Yuffie blinked down at you. "You really didn't mind it?" she said.

"Not at all! The only thing that stopped me having fun was that it was slightly painful when you walked around. Otherwise I would have loved to do it again," you said, proud at how nice you had been to her. However, instead of replying Yuffie looked thoughtful for a moment and you were slightly concerned at what she was thinking. Had you gone too far?
113112111.title: "You were where?"

1131121111.content:
Yuffie soon comes back and you see her holding a Protect materia. You feel a faint tingle all over your body as she casts Protect on you and you wonder what she has planned for you.

"There! Now you'll be safe!" she said with a happy smile. You try not to groan out loud as she pulls her boots off and a familiar but gross odour filled the room. Yuffie sniffed both her boots, squeezing her eyes shut at how strong they smelled. She holds them down near you and you think you might be turning green. You hope it's just you and she doesn't noticed how grossed out you are by how her feet and boots stink.

"Which do you think smells strongest? I can't decide," she asks. She sticks her left boot in front of you and you cough as you smell the really strong fishy odour coming out of it. She replaces it with her right boot and if anything the smell is even stronger. Your eyes begin to water as she moves it a bit closer and you can't take it anymore.

"Yes! That one's stronger!" you cry. You sigh in relief as Yuffie pulls her boot away and sniffs it herself.

"Oh gross! Eww you're right. This one's worse," she says with a giggle. She grabs her other boot and pulls it on her foot before dropping her stinky right boot in front of you. Suddenly you realise what she wants you to do and your heart sinks. She want you to go back in her boot while she wears it!

"Come on then! I'll make it enjoyable for you! I promise!" she says.

You feel sick but you know you couldn't stand up to her even if you wanted to. You edge into the boot and walk down the shaft, the smell of fish getting stronger as you head down the moist dark tunnel. When you're almost at the bottom she turns her boot the right way up and you tumble forward landing face first in a stinky grimy pool of sweat. You spit the foot sweat out as you look up to see Yuffie poke her face over the shaft of the boot.

"You want me to leave my socks on or do you want me to take them off?" she grins.

You can't decide which would be worse. Her socks smelled as though she had been wearing them for days and they'd probably absorbed several days of foot sweat. Of course, they were also the only things insulating her feet, which could possibly smell even worse if they were unleashed. Either way your were doomed but which would be worse for you . . . and which did you really want?
1131121111.title: "Just one sec!" Yuffie goes to her mate...

11311211111.content:
You decided that nothing would be worse than being crushed by her socks again, and although her feet would be pretty stinky there was no way they'd be as bad as her socks, surely!

"Barefoot!" you said with a grimace.

"Oh gotcha!" Yuffie said. She started jumping up and down which made the whole boot shake. You wobbled from side to side and eventually sat down in a puddle of sweat that splashed around you.

"Just be gentle, please!" you said, trying to appear as happy as possible about this.

"Oh! Don't worry. You're gonna love this!" Yuffie squealed with happiness. Slowly the ninja started to peel her thigh high socks off her leg, deliberately positioning herself over her boot so you could see her feet as they were exposed to the air.

As she pulled off her left sock you saw that her bare leg was glistening with sweat below the knees, and you began to regret your decision. Eventually she got down to the foot and with a bit of effort pulled the sock right off, exposing her foot for the first time in days. You got a first whiff of how it smelled, and you immediately held a hand over your nose. It made her sock seem like a rose garden by comparison...it was shiny with sweat and slimy drops were dropping from the underside of her foot. Some drops hit the side of the boot and slithered down the soft leather, and a few even hit the bottom of the boot with a large splash, like giant raindrops. She wiggled her toes in front of you, and the smell completely assaulted you all over.

"Um, actually, can you leave your socks on instead?" you said, trying not to retch.

"Too late!" she grinned. She held her left socks up to her nose and sniffed them.

"Oh, gross!" she wrinkled up her nose and coughed. "Oh, I feel so sorry for you. This is going to feel so horrible."

Yuffie giggled again, accidentally dropping her sock. Given where she was standing, it wasn't a surprise that it fell into the boot that you were in, and your eyes widened in horror as the huge black ball plummeted towards you. You groaned as it hit you in the face with a wet squelch, smothering you in sweat and filling your mouth with bits of toe jam that you spat out. You heard her laugh and she reached into the boot to pull her sock out again.

"Oops. Sorry about that," she giggled. She pulled off her right sock and you could just shake your head as the smell hit you. Her right foot definitely smelled worse, like fish and cheese mashed together. She rested her now bare foot on the side of her boot, sweat running down the inside of the boot.

Her foot covered the top of her knee high boot and the light dimmed until you could hardly see anything. You awaited your fate again, knowing it was going to be so much worse than before. Very slowly, Yuffie eased her foot into the boot. You could hear the rustle of her bare foot against the leather of her tall boot and you could just about make out her shiny bare foot making its way towards you. You cringed and knelt down as it rubbed against you. You recoiled from the disgusting touch of her soft, stinky feet, but there was nowhere to do and you couldn't do anything but think of anywhere you'd rather be as her foot nestled into the bottom of the boot with a loud squelch.

You were squashed between her feet and the sole of her boot. It didn't hurt that much, thanks to the protect materia, but you felt awful all the same. Yuffie wiggled her toes again, causing you to slither between them as sweat poured from her feet and covered you all over.

Could it get any worse than this?
11311211111.title: "Go Barefoot!"

choices: yuffie thinks you were a dream

113112111112.title: Yuffie tries something else.

122.content:
Crash! With a well aimed Fira spell you manage to knock the T-Rexuar's head into one of the trees that littered the training facility of Balamb Garden. The mighty beast roars in pain and then slumps to the ground, affording you, finally, the chance to take a breather. You'd been slaying monsters for about an hour now and you were working up a bit of a sweat.

Your hand comes up to mop your damp brow as you slump against the still warm corpse of your kill. Taking a deep breath you find your centre once more. Thoughts consume you, thoughts of passing your combat exam the next day, you were anxious at the prospect but Instructor Quistis Trepe was your examiner, and she was said to be quite lenient.

You're brought from your concentration by a high pitched hiss and a scream, it seems in your resting you had neglected to noticed the plant-like Grat creature a mere 2 feet away from you. It apparently didn't like you encroaching on it's territory. Before you can pick up your weapon, however, it shoots a cloud of blue spores at your face, causing you to choke and splutter as you gasp for air.

Your vision grows fuzzy and eventually dim as you pass out.

Waking up you feel like you'd been drinking heavily all day, your vision was blurry and you were groggy. The cloud of confusion is soon lifted though and you gaze around at your surroundings. Your hand is resting on a large metal structure, looking up the length of it you gasp and recoil in horror. It was your sword, but it was as big as a skyscraper.

As the situation starts to sink in you hear, and feel, a titanic rumbling in the ground beneath you. You prepare yourself to fight another towering T-rexuar but as you turn round you see that a dinosaur is not the source of the ominous rumblings. Gazing up you see a field of yellow fabric, looking straight ahead you see two massive brown suede boots, ones that were heading ever closer towards you. You know this outfit, it was that energetic busybody, Selphie Tilmit.

She stops for a few seconds looking around, her last titanic footfall knocking you over with the sheer force of the quake it caused. You had to act fast, how best to get her attention?
122.title: Basic Training Gone Bad.

123.content:
Detention. It wasn't usually a fun concept. But seeing as how your teacher was the smoking hot Quistis Trepe, things were a little different. She'd caught you sleeping during one of her classes (wasn't your fault, some kid had been experimenting with a Sleep spell!) and had assigned you a detention. Normally you'd be a little bummed, but hey! you get to spend time with Quistis!

You took your seat in the classroom, while you wait for your detention to be served. Eventually, Quistis enters the classroom, and approaches you. "Stand up." She said and you rose up as ordered. She gave a small smirk. "For your detention, I'm going to use you as a target for a Blue Magic spell I picked up recently." She continued. "Just stand there, and it'll be over in a second." You stand where she tells you, and there was suddenly a bright flash of light. It began to fade into blackness. The last thing you heard as you passed out was "....incredible." And you thought you caught a glimpse of an enormous boot, ten times your size.....

When you wake up, you're no longer in the classroom. You're....
123.title: Detention

125.content: So, you want the sorceress Edea? Or maybe the sorceress of the future, Ultimecia!
125.title: Present and Future

1251.content:
Blackness... that was all you could see. One moment you were off doing... whatever... and the next... you were here.

Why were you here? What happened to you?

'I needed you...' A silky smooth, feminine voice purred out at you, before the black void was replaced... by a throne room. At the center sat an odd looking woman, wearing a skin-tight red gown with a plunging neckline that exposed her neck, chest, stomach and abdomen, and only partially obscuring her breasts. A black collar extended down the neckline to her waist, and long red sleeves with prominent shoulder pads joined with her purple taloned hands.

Her skin is tattooed with lined patterns, and she's wearing a gold necklace, earrings and hair jewelry among a headdress designed to pull her hair up to resemble horns; silver bangs are left to frame her face. She also has yellow eyes surrounded by purple eyeshadow and she wears deep red lipstick. She has no eyebrows, instead having tattoos.

Most oddly, she is not wearing shoes, completely barefoot, and although she has a human appearance, her toenails resemble a beast's claws. It's these toes that she bares, beckoning you forward. Unable to stop yourself, you move forward, slowly growing more aware that you are shrinking with every step you take, until you're the size of one of those toe claws.

She sets her foot down next to you, regarding you with a cold, callous stare. Her next word feels heavy, like it's lined with power.

"Worship."

You immediately fall to your knees and press your face to her foot, licking away at the skin and flesh, moaning in sheer pleasure as you do. She smirks cruelly down at you and raises the foot out of reach.

"My name is Ultimecia... you may call me 'Goddess'. I summoned you out of your time because..." She steps her foot down on your legs, flattening them. "I want you... to revere me." She purred, twisting her foot to turn your legs into jelly. You scream, only to be muffled as she places a toe on your mouth. Clicking her fingers, a greenish-blue light surrounds you, reconstructing your legs and killing the pain.

"You think I'd let you die just like that...? Oh no... You're mine." She grins evilly down at you...
1251.title: Ultimecia!

132.content:
As usual, the sun is shining bright in Madain Sari, where a group of young adventurers are settling down for a relaxing lunvh near the waterfall.

''Alright everyone, listen up!'' A tiny, purple haired six year old bellows to get attention, ''I need someone to help Mocha peel potatoes, and someone to carry this big pot for me!''

''I got the pot!'' A blonde young man answers swiftly, bounding to his feet.

''I-I'll... give the potatoes a try!'' A teenage girl, of comparable age to the blonde boy, pipes up, and follows into the kitchen.

=========================

''Alright, thanks a bunch Zidane!'' the purple haired girl chimes, as the monkey tailed blonde plonks a heavy saucepan on the table, ''No problem, Eiko.''

He glances to his left however, and notices that things aren't going so well with the potatoes, ''Dagger? You doin'... OK?''

''Not... really...'' The dark haired teen responds, sighing as she attempts to chisel the skin from a potato. Her efforts aren't going well though, having only managed a couple, and even those are squared, bruised, and still showing skin.

''Whaaaat?!'' Eiko cries, jumping up and shafting Mocha the moogle aside, ''You can't even peel potatoes, Dagger? What's wrong with you?!''

''I-I can, but-'' Dagger begins, but Eiko is hearing none of it, ''here, gimme the knife. You go sit down, and don't you worry about all this hard, hard work, OK?''

''Aww, but-'' she protests, however Eiko just silences her, ''Go.''

''...fine.'' She grumbles, and stomps back outside to sit with their last team member, a reserved looking black mage with a pointy, overlarge hat.

''W-what's wrong, Dagger?'' The mage asks tentatively.

''Ohh, don't you worry Vivi.'' Dagger sighs, glaring at Eiko as she peels the potatoes at a blistering pace, almost as if she's doing it to show off to Zidane.

''Just Eiko being a brat, that's all.'' Dagger mutters darkly, ''humiliating me like that, how could she? The little-''

But as Vivi's eyes widen, Dagger's mouth snaps shut. For her mind is hatching a plan.
132.title: Tiny teens.

1321.content:
''Wow...'' Zidane grunts, letting out a guttural belch, ''Amazing food, Eiko. Well done.''

''Teehee, thanks!'' Eiko giggles, mock curtseying, ''I'll just go get the dishes started...''

''Like hell you will!'' Zidane exclaims, ''you cooked, so we'll clean! C'mon Vivi, I'll wash, you dry.''

''Uhmm... I dunno if I'd be any good at that, Zidane.'' Vivi mumbles earnestly, ''I mean-''

''Oh, bull!'' Zidane forestalls him, ''with your Fire magic, they'll be dry in no time!''

And the two young men head off into the kitchen, leaving Dagger and Eiko on their own outside.

''So... how 'bout them square potatoes, huh?'' Eiko laughs snidely at her expense.

''S-sorry if I didn't peel them very well...'' Dagger fumes inwardly, resisting the urge to hit something, or worse, her. But she remains calm. Because she still has to put her plan into action.

With Eiko's back turned, Dagger quickly grbas her staff, and mutters a spell, ''minima adaptus inverae...''

And unbeknownst to little Eiko, she's about to become much smaller!

''Huh? What the?!''

The six year old is surrounded by a vivid white light, and starts to decrease in size, ''Dagger, what're you doing?!''

But next thing Eiko knows, she's only a few inches tall - five at the most - and a now gigantic Dagger is casually walking towards her position.

''Ohh, I dunno...'' Dagger laughs sikily as she kneels down in front of the shrunken Eiko, ''just exacting a little revenge, is all.''

With Zidane and Vivi completely oblivious in the kitchen just a few feet away, Eiko screams with terror as she is...
